.toast {
    attribute: value1
}

.toast {
    attribute: value2;
}

.toast {
    attribute: 333px #123456 #abcdef value value value;
}

.toast {
    attribute: value value value value value value
}



    .toast {
        __attribute_value-longAnd_different_      :      value value value;
    }

.toast {
    value: |min-width: 530px ? 333px : 122px| value value;
}

.toast {
    height: |orientation: vertical ? 222px : value|;
}

.toast {
    height: |orientation: vertical ? 222px : value|
}

.toast {
    height: |orientation: horizontal? 222px : value|
}
